turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Task 1: Visiting a Medical Clinic

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hello.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “uh okay is there the skin medical center right?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and I'd like to make an appointment to see a doctor”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, sorry. Oh, sorry, sorry. Okay, can I say back again?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, hi, I'd like to make an appointment to see a doctor.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, can you say that again slowly?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is it okay any day?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I have allergy to cat and I have a cold and tickles in skin and eyes.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is it anyone okay for... me?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I will go to English school in the morning, so I'd like to make an appointment in the afternoon.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: 텍스트 기록 사용할 수 없음

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “You have to say that appointment days or time.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I'll see you tomorrow at 2pm.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh yes, is it okay, but if I don't have an appointment, how long is the current wait that day?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, I'd like to make an appointment at 2 p.m. on tomorrow.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is it okay if I come in 10 minutes early?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and is there a cancellation fee?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and I'd like to confirm my appointment for tomorrow.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and can I make an appointment for someone else?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, her name is Diana, but I don't know that her symptom.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes. I don't know.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “And do I need to bring the medical card? My medical card?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I'm a foreigner, so do I need to bring my passport?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “And I just needed to repeat pre-inception.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I have to ask for some documents for insurance.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, but getting a document is free.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you so much. I will see you at 2 p.m. on tomorrow.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Goodbye.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hello, is there a Common wealth bank?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I have a problem with my account.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Before, when I put my PIN number in ATM, but my PIN number was wrong, so after, I couldn't use my check card.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I'm not sure, but I tried it maybe over three times.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sorry, can you say that again?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, and I don't have an ID because I'm a foreigner, so I have to, will I bring my passport?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I have one more question.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “If I go a bank, how long current wait?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “OK.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I, I do like to make an appointment at that bank, is it possible?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Today 2 p.m.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you. See you that day.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Please thank you for helping me.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and are you a house owner, right? I saw the share house in Hojunara.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I'm looking for a single room and I'm interested in the one bedroom unit on the town hall.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Two weeks, after two weeks.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, sorry. Can you say back again?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “have ranges? What do you mean?” Sure! I just mean how much you'd like to spend on rent each month. So what's the monthly budget you're comfortable with?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I saw that the room in share house is $300 in a week.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and are there any expansion time? Can I go to Inspection?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Are there any inspection times this weekend?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I prefer to see the Saturday afternoon.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “For how much is the bond?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, is there any furniture, or I have to buy this?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is there any washing machine?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, if I have a question, I will ask you on inspection day.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you so much. Bye-bye.”
